title: The Entity
description:
You're Jack, the man who recently moved to his late grandmother's house. He wakes up at 3 am to hear strange sounds around the house, he remembers how he heard them when he was younger. His grandmother always told him that it was just a pipe, he was not too sure.

Version: v.0.4 Full
Language of game: Russian, English

The Entity is a game in the horror house, you need to go through the house, opening the notes that your grandmother left you many years ago about strange creatures. Do not forget to keep track of the keys, because some of them are hidden. The keys and hints light up slightly so you can see them more easily.

We did not just want Entity to become another typical horror game, so we tried to find the best ways to scare. When viewing a beautiful house, be sure to monitor the power of your generator, as if it becomes empty, you will die. Charging the phone severely depletes the power of the generator, if you continue to do this, but also having many lights at the same time will have the same effect. Entity has three different and completely unique endings that you can explore depending on what you are doing in the game.

The entity has support for partial control (you'll need a keyboard / mouse for the menu), and currently we support six languages, English, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Polish, German and Russian. If there is a need to add other languages, we will add them.

MINIMUM:
OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit OS required)
RAM: 4 GB of RAM
DirectX: Version 11
Disk space: 3 GB
